prov:entity.preprocessor:add_fx_variables: {'fx_variables': {'areacella': {'short_name': 'areacella', 'preprocessor': 'spatial_mean', 'project': 'CMIP6', 'mip': 'fx', 'derive': True, 'variable_group': 'areacella', 'diagnostic': 'ecs_cmip6', 'dataset': 'ACCESS-CM2', 'exp': 'abrupt-4xCO2', 'ensemble': 'r1i1p1f1', 'grid': 'gn', 'institute': 'CSIRO-ARCCSS', 'recipe_dataset_index': 1, 'timerange': '0950/1099', 'activity': 'CMIP', 'alias': 'ACCESS-CM2_abrupt-4xCO2', 'original_short_name': 'areacella', 'standard_name': 'cell_area', 'long_name': 'Grid-Cell Area for Atmospheric Grid Variables', 'units': 'm2', 'modeling_realm': ['atmos', 'land'], 'frequency': 'fx', 'start_year': 950, 'end_year': 1099, 'filename': '/g/data/fs38/publications/CMIP6/CMIP/CSIRO-ARCCSS/ACCESS-CM2/abrupt-4xCO2/r1i1p1f1/fx/areacella/gn/latest/areacella_fx_ACCESS-CM2_abrupt-4xCO2_r1i1p1f1_gn.nc'}}, 'check_level': <CheckLevels.DEFAULT: 3>}

prov:entity.attribute:caption: Scatterplot between TOA radiance and global mean surface temperature anomaly for 150 years of the abrupt 4x CO2 experiment including linear regression to calculate ECS for ACCESS-CM2 (CMIP6).

prov:entity.attribute:description: This recipe evaluates the equilibrium climate sensitivity (ECS) and the transient climate response (TCR) for various CMIP generations.

prov:entity.preprocessor:add_fx_variables: {'fx_variables': {'areacella': {'short_name': 'areacella', 'preprocessor': 'spatial_mean', 'project': 'CMIP6', 'mip': 'fx', 'derive': True, 'variable_group': 'areacella', 'diagnostic': 'ecs_cmip6', 'dataset': 'ACCESS-CM2', 'exp': 'piControl', 'ensemble': 'r1i1p1f1', 'grid': 'gn', 'institute': 'CSIRO-ARCCSS', 'recipe_dataset_index': 0, 'timerange': '0950/1099', 'activity': 'CMIP', 'alias': 'ACCESS-CM2_piControl', 'original_short_name': 'areacella', 'standard_name': 'cell_area', 'long_name': 'Grid-Cell Area for Atmospheric Grid Variables', 'units': 'm2', 'modeling_realm': ['atmos', 'land'], 'frequency': 'fx', 'start_year': 950, 'end_year': 1099, 'filename': '/g/data/fs38/publications/CMIP6/CMIP/CSIRO-ARCCSS/ACCESS-CM2/piControl/r1i1p1f1/fx/areacella/gn/latest/areacella_fx_ACCESS-CM2_piControl_r1i1p1f1_gn.nc'}}, 'check_level': <CheckLevels.DEFAULT: 3>}
